Posts.Content: Yes...girl.  I just had my first mammo (ever) yesterday and I experienced the same exact thing.  I now have stretch marks on the top of both of my breasts that were NOT there before. It was the most pain I have ever experienced in my life.  I will never do another one again.  I am so soar right now and it really was traumatizing to me. So...you are not alone.  Take care.
Posts.Title: Do mammograms cause stretch marks?
